event.title: was incorporated as a municipal district on July 31, 1999

data.event: Beaver County was incorporated as a municipal district on July 31, 1999, and the name was changed from "County of Beaver No. 9" to "Beaver County".
In the 2011 Census, Beaver County had a population of 5,689 living in 2,109 of its 2,324 total dwellings, a 0.2% change from its 2006 population of 5,676.
In 2001, 5,644 people were living in 2,094 dwellings, a 0.3% decrease in population from 1996.
